LTD. PLS ADD dry@laascomaritime.com INTO UR CIRCULATION LIST  Dear PIC // KHUSHBOO  Re: MV GLORY SEA / 56K / 2011 BUILT // OPEN VIZAG O/A 22nd  AUG IAGW WP GOOD DAY HAV FOLL VSL DIRECT FRM OUR OWNS PLS ADVICE SUITABLE EMPLOYMENT FOR HER  MV Glory Sea / 56K / 2011 BUILT // OPEN VIZAG 22ND AUG IAGW WPCAN TRY ANY DIRECTION PREFER TCTGO FOR MONEY  ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ VESSEL DESCRIPTION  MV Glory SeaDWT 56,623mt on abt 12.80m ssw draft, sdbcBuilt 2011, Class CCS, HK flag, LOA/Beam 189.99/32.26 mGRT 32,962/ NRT 19,142,  TPC 58.85 ho/ 5 ha, grain 71,634 cbm4x30mt cranes, grabs 4*12.0cbm Speed/ Consumption:Ballast: about 12.5 kn on abt 22.5mt/day LSFO 380cst +abt2.5mt/day for 1 A/E + 0.1mt LSMGO excl ballasting/ deballasting/ workingLaden: about 12.0 kn on abt 22.5mt/day LSFO 380cst + abt 2.5mt/day for 1 A/E + 0.1mt LSMGO excl ballasting/ deballasting/ workingIn/off port working: abt 6.0mt LSFO + abt 0.2mt LSMGO excl ballasting/ deballastingIn/off port idle: abt 3.5mt LSFO + abt 0.2mt LSMGO excl ballasting/ deballastingADA WOG ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ BrgdsKhushbooMob.: +91 9650408611Email : dry@laascomaritime.comSkype: live:.cid.48f892c4de7ca4e0 Rohit ChauhanMob.: +91 9634223213Email : dry@laascomaritime.comSkype: rohit­­_brisk@outlook.com Mayank Jaiswal Mob.: +91 8800225472Email : mailto:dry@laascomaritime.comSkype: Mayank_jaiswal87 Laasco Maritime India Pvt Ltd.1x67, ILD Trade Centre, Sohna RoadSector 47, Gurugram, Haryana122018www.laascomaritime.com
